trans-unit.source: Represents a tablet pen used with a Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma caneta tablet utilizada com um Tablet PC.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que os relatórios atual entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que os relatórios atual entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Binds input from the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Vincula a partir de caneta de entrada para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element to which the stylus is bound.
trans-unit.target: O elemento ao qual está vinculada a caneta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input element is captured successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento de entrada é capturado com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: element is neither or .
trans-unit.target: elementis neither or .

trans-unit.source: Binds the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Está vinculado a caneta para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element to which the stylus is bound.
trans-unit.target: O elemento ao qual está vinculada a caneta.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input element is captured successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento de entrada é capturado com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element or captureMode is .
trans-unit.target: elementor captureMode is .

trans-unit.source: element is neither or .
trans-unit.target: elementis neither or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that captured the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento capturado de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that captured the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> que capturou a caneta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the pointer is positioned over.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> posicionada sobre o ponteiro.

trans-unit.source: The element the pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do ponteiro é superior.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> para que a (`x,y`) coordenadas são mapeadas.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the position of the stylus, in relation to relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: A que representa a posição de caneta, em relação à relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contenha <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos recolhidos a partir de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> para que a (`x,y`) coordena no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> são mapeados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects that the stylus collected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contenha <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos que é recolhida de caneta.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contenha <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos recolhidos a partir de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`tem de ser compatível com o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>utilizado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the GetStylusPoints method.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>antes de chamar o método GetStylusPoints.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> para que a (`x y`) coordena no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> são mapeados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contenha <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos recolhidos a partir de caneta.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do dispositivo de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do dispositivo de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the tablet pen is positioned above, yet not in contact with, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se a caneta tablet está posicionada acima, mas não in contact with, o digitizer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen is positioned above, yet not in contact with, the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta está posicionada acima, mas não in contact with, digitizer; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the tablet pen is in range of the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a caneta tablet está no intervalo do digitizer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen is within range of the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta estiver dentro do intervalo de digitizer; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the secondary tip of the stylus is in use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a sugestão da caneta secundária está em utilização.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the secondary tip of the stylus is in use; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a sugestão da caneta secundária está a ser utilizado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a stylus device is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um dispositivo de caneta é válido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate a stylus is valid; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar uma caneta é válido. caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The name of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O nome de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus buttons on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os botões de caneta de caneta.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonCollection"></xref> object representing all of the buttons on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonCollection"> </xref> objeto que representa todos os botões de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Sincroniza o cursor e a interface de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Applications may need to locate the element that the cursor is positioned over.
trans-unit.target: Aplicações poderão ter de localizar o elemento que o cursor estar posicionado sobre.

trans-unit.source: If the application uses animation, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação utilizar animação, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>método pode devolver um elemento que foi movida a partir de cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Synchronize to be sure that <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> returns the proper element.
trans-unit.target: Chamar sincronizar ser Certifique-se que <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>devolve o elemento adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> representing the digitizer associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> que representa o digitizer associado atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> represents the digitizer associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> representa digitizer associado atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento que recebe a entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> object that receives input.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> objeto que recebe a entrada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o nome do dispositivo de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.
